channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s America250 to create world’s largest US flag, taller than Empire State Building

item.title: Trump moves Space Command to Alabama, reversing Biden decision
item.description: President Trump announced Tuesday that U.S. Space Command will move from Colorado to Alabama, a decision that was "seven years in the making."

item.title: The Genocide Lie Is Back
item.description: A new resolution condemning Israel is about as marred as the process that produced it.

item.description: The ruling is part of the government’s landmark antitrust case against Google-parent Alphabet

item.title: Time to Force Putin to the Negotiating Table
item.description: He is clearly trying to play President Trump by talking peace while waging war. He will find that a very dangerous game.

item.title: Walmart and Target are allegedly forcing employees to remove tags on apparel to make it easier to jack up prices based on tariffs
item.description: Social media posts claim that removing price tags can allow the retailers to raise prices more easily, possibly in response to tariffs.

item.title: The Tariff Power Still Belongs Only to Congress
item.description: Trump lost the case on his tariffs because only Congress has the power to tax.

item.title: President Trump Is Right to Fight European Tech Overreach

item.description: It is totally implausible that the parents and family members of some 600 children are waiting to kill their kids when they come home.
